from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

counter = Counter(a)

ans = max(counter[4], counter[8], counter[15], counter[16], counter[23], counter[42])

for i in range(4, 43, 6):
    ans = min(ans, counter[i] + counter[i + 1] + counter[i + 2] + counter[i + 3] + counter[i + 4] + counter[i + 5])

print(n - 6 * ans)
